translated: If on the right and left of the forehead🔽there are two like the teats of a cow, that will destroy the kingdom.

original: ba yi nu sor lta bu dag / yod pa de yis rgyal srid 'jig / ba glang rva 'dra ru ru yi //
analyzed: ba yi nu sor lta bu dag / yod pa de yis rgyal srid 'jig / ba glang rva 'dra ru ru yi //
translated: If there is a dewlap like a cow's udder,

original: rva yi rtse'am pa nu 'dra //
analyzed: rva yi rtse'am pa nu 'dra //
translated: like the tip of a horn or a nipple.🔽Like the tip of a scale,

original: lci ba'i rtse mo lta bu'am //🔽de bzhin pags pa'i mdzer ba'i dbyibs //
analyzed: lci ba'i rtse mo lta bu'am // de bzhin pags pa'i mdzer ba'i dbyibs //
translated: or like the shape of a skin mole.

original: yang na bil ba lta bu'am ;
analyzed: yang na bil ba lta bu'am ;
translated: Or like a bilva fruit,

original: / lag sor lta bu'i rva dag ni //
analyzed: / lag sor lta bu'i rva dag ni //
translated: or like a finger,🔽thick or thin,🔽long or short, rough or smooth,

original: sbom po'am yang na phra mo dag / ring dang thung dang rtsub dang ljang //🔽sra dang snyi ba gang yang rung //🔽rna rtsa'am skra mtshams tha ma'am //
analyzed: sbom po'am yang na phra mo dag / ring dang thung dang rtsub dang ljang // sra dang snyi ba gang yang rung // rna rtsa'am skra mtshams tha ma'am //
translated: hard or soft.🔽At the edge of the ear, at the hairline,

original: dpral ba yang na spyi bo'am //
analyzed: dpral ba yang na spyi bo'am //
translated: on the forehead, or on the crown of the head,

original: de las gzhan pa'i gnas dag tu //🔽de las gzhan pa'i dbyibs yod pa ;
analyzed: de las gzhan pa'i gnas dag tu // de las gzhan pa'i dbyibs yod pa ;
translated: or in any other place,🔽whatever shape it has,🔽if it appears there,

original: / gang byung de ni rva can de //
analyzed: / gang byung de ni rva can de //
translated: that is the one with the horn.

original: bdag po yul 'khor 'jig byed yin //
analyzed: bdag po yul 'khor 'jig byed yin //
translated: He will destroy the king and the kingdom.

original: yul phyogs gang na rta de yod //
analyzed: yul phyogs gang na rta de yod //
translated: In whatever country that horse is,

original: yul de rlag par 'gyur pa yin //
analyzed: yul de rlag par 'gyur pa yin //
translated: that country will be destroyed.

original: des na de ni dgra bo yi //
analyzed: des na de ni dgra bo yi //
translated: Therefore, send that enemy

original: yul du bskyal la rjes zhi bya //
analyzed: yul du bskyal la rjes zhi bya //
translated: to a foreign land and pacify him.

original: rta ni gang gi ba la ni //
analyzed: rta ni gang gi ba la ni //
translated: In whatever place the horse

original: sha khra yis ni kun du khyab //
analyzed: sha khra yis ni kun du khyab //
translated: is covered all over with vultures,

original: de bzhin rkub dang rlig pa dang // rna ba ngag dang mig tu byung //
analyzed: de bzhin rkub dang rlig pa dang // rna ba ngag dang mig tu byung //
translated: Likewise, if it appears in the anus, the penis, the ears, the voice, or the eyes,

original: rta de sha khra can zhes bya //
analyzed: rta de sha khra can zhes bya //
translated: that horse is called “spotted flesh.”

original: mi shis sdig pa'i mtshan nyid can //
analyzed: mi shis sdig pa'i mtshan nyid can //
translated: It is an inauspicious sign of sin.

original: rta bres su ni mi gzhug cing //
analyzed: rta bres su ni mi gzhug cing //
translated: One should not put it in the horse’s bit,

original: bkra shis 'dod pas reg mi bya //
analyzed: bkra shis 'dod pas reg mi bya //
translated: nor should one touch it if one desires good fortune.

original: mig gi nyes pa bshad bya yi //🔽khyi mig dom dang byi ba'i mig / sbal mig nor bu'i mig 'dra dang // byi ba 'ug pa nya mig can //
analyzed: mig gi nyes pa bshad bya yi // khyi mig dom dang byi ba'i mig / sbal mig nor bu'i mig 'dra dang // byi ba 'ug pa nya mig can //
translated: I will explain the faults of the eyes:🔽dog eyes, bear eyes, mouse eyes,🔽frog eyes, jewel eyes,🔽rat eyes, owl eyes, fish eyes,

original: phag dang khyu mchog lta bu'i mig / bya rog lug dang khra mig can //
analyzed: phag dang khyu mchog lta bu'i mig / bya rog lug dang khra mig can //
translated: pig eyes, bull eyes, crow eyes, sheep eyes, hawk eyes,

original: khra yi mig can smad pa yin //
analyzed: khra yi mig can smad pa yin //
translated: and hawk-like eyes are contemptible.🔽Eyes that are crooked, evil,

original: mig yo mig ni gdug pa dang // mig ser ba yang spang bar bya //
analyzed: mig yo mig ni gdug pa dang // mig ser ba yang spang bar bya //
translated: or yellow should also be avoided.

original: des ni bdag po mi bde zhing //
analyzed: des ni bdag po mi bde zhing //
translated: They will make the master unhappy

original: rigs zad pa yang byed pa yin //
analyzed: rigs zad pa yang byed pa yin //
translated: and will cause the family line to end.

original: g-yul du bdag po pham dang gsod //
analyzed: g-yul du bdag po pham dang gsod //
translated: In battle, the master will be defeated or killed.

original: rkan gyi mdog ni sna tshogs dang // dbyibs kyi 'bras bu nga yis bshad //
analyzed: rkan gyi mdog ni sna tshogs dang // dbyibs kyi 'bras bu nga yis bshad //
translated: I will explain the results of the various colors and shapes of the palate.

original: ge sar nag po lta bu yi //
analyzed: ge sar nag po lta bu yi //
translated: If it is like a black pistil,

original: thig le gang la khyab gyur pa //
analyzed: thig le gang la khyab gyur pa //
translated: The one on which the bindu is located

original: des ni lam du nyon mongs 'gyur //🔽rkan gyi phyed ni dkar ba yis //
analyzed: des ni lam du nyon mongs 'gyur // rkan gyi phyed ni dkar ba yis //
translated: will be afflicted by the path.🔽The half of the palate that is white

original: nor zad ge sar lta bu yis //
analyzed: nor zad ge sar lta bu yis //
translated: is like the stamen of a lotus.
If it is blocked,

original: na mi shis gyur pa yin //
analyzed: na mi shis gyur pa yin //
translated: it will lead to misfortune.🔽The palate that is oily and deep

original: rkan ni snum zhing zab pa dang // dmar bar gyur na bsngags pa yin //
analyzed: rkan ni snum zhing zab pa dang // dmar bar gyur na bsngags pa yin //
translated: and has become red is praised.

original: shin tu dmar zhing cher khyab la //
analyzed: shin tu dmar zhing cher khyab la //
translated: If it is very red and very spread out

original: rtsub mo med la'ang 'bras bu che //
analyzed: rtsub mo med la'ang 'bras bu che //
translated: and is not rough, it will have great results.

original: snum chung dmar ba'i sha chung ba //
analyzed: snum chung dmar ba'i sha chung ba //
translated: If it is not oily, red, or fleshy,

original: 'bras bu chung bar shes par bya //
analyzed: 'bras bu chung bar shes par bya //
translated: it should be understood to have small results.

original: rkan gyi kha dog 'bras bu dang // so yi 'bras bu nyid dang ni //
analyzed: rkan gyi kha dog 'bras bu dang // so yi 'bras bu nyid dang ni //
translated: The color of the palate, the results of the teeth,🔽and the characteristics of the place🔽should be examined in four ways.

original: mtshan nyid gnas dang bzhi las brtag / rlig 'bras gcig pa bdag po gsod //
analyzed: mtshan nyid gnas dang bzhi las brtag / rlig 'bras gcig pa bdag po gsod //
translated: One testicle will kill the master.

original: rlig 'bras gsum pa bu gsod byed //
analyzed: rlig 'bras gsum pa bu gsod byed //
translated: Three testicles will kill the son.

original: rlig 'bras med pa bkra mi shis //
analyzed: rlig 'bras med pa bkra mi shis //
translated: No testicles are inauspicious.

original: rlig 'bras dmar ser nor nyams byed //
analyzed: rlig 'bras dmar ser nor nyams byed //
translated: Yellowish testicles will diminish wealth.🔽Very hanging testicles

original: rlig 'bras shin tu 'phyang ba dang // g-yul du bdag po gsod par byed //
analyzed: rlig 'bras shin tu 'phyang ba dang // g-yul du bdag po gsod par byed //
translated: will kill the master in battle.

original: rlig pa spu ni che ba 'am //🔽yang na ser skyar gyur pa'am //
analyzed: rlig pa spu ni che ba 'am // yang na ser skyar gyur pa'am //
translated: If the testicles are very hairy,🔽or if they are yellowish,

original: de bzhin zhu bar gyur pa yang //
analyzed: de bzhin zhu bar gyur pa yang //
translated: or if they are sunken,

original: de yis bdag po gsod byed yin //
analyzed: de yis bdag po gsod byed yin //
translated: they will kill the master.

original: kha dog gzhan dang ldan pa la //🔽pus mo gnyis ni nag gyur cing //
analyzed: kha dog gzhan dang ldan pa la // pus mo gnyis ni nag gyur cing //
translated: If the color is different,🔽and the two knees are black,

original: sre long nag por gyur pa ni //
analyzed: sre long nag por gyur pa ni //
translated: and the hocks are black,

original: bdag po gsod byed shes par bya //
analyzed: bdag po gsod byed shes par bya //
translated: one should know that they will kill the master.

original: lus kyi kha dog nyid las ni //
analyzed: lus kyi kha dog nyid las ni //
translated: From the color of the body itself,

original: rnga ma'i kha dog gzhan gyur pa //
analyzed: rnga ma'i kha dog gzhan gyur pa //
translated: if the color of the tail is different,

original: 'bar ba'i rnga ma can zhes bya //
analyzed: 'bar ba'i rnga ma can zhes bya //
translated: it is called a “flaming tail”;

original: rta de rtag tu spang bar bya //
analyzed: rta de rtag tu spang bar bya //
translated: that horse should always be avoided.

original: rnga ma'i rtse mo mdog gzhan gyur //
analyzed: rnga ma'i rtse mo mdog gzhan gyur //
translated: If the tip of the tail is a different color,

original: yul 'khor yang ni rlag par byed //
analyzed: yul 'khor yang ni rlag par byed //
translated: it will destroy the kingdom.

original: rta ni mdog dkar gyur pa la //
analyzed: rta ni mdog dkar gyur pa la //
translated: If the horse becomes white in color,

original: nag po cung zad yod mi shis //
analyzed: nag po cung zad yod mi shis //
translated: it is not suitable to have any black.🔽If the ears and the mane are black,

original: rna ba dang ni rngog ma nag / rnga rtse nag por gyur pa ni //
analyzed: rna ba dang ni rngog ma nag / rnga rtse nag por gyur pa ni //
translated: and the tip of the tail is black,

original: de ni rna nag yin zhes bya //
analyzed: de ni rna nag yin zhes bya //
translated: it is called “black ears”;

original: las rnams kun la shis pa yin //
analyzed: las rnams kun la shis pa yin //
translated: it is auspicious for all activities.

original: g-yul dang lam zhugs khal bkal ba //
analyzed: g-yul dang lam zhugs khal bkal ba //
translated: If it is loaded with a burden on a battlefield or a road,

original: rgyal po'i 'dod pa kun sgrub yin //
analyzed: rgyal po'i 'dod pa kun sgrub yin //
translated: it will accomplish all the king’s desires.

original: rnga ma 'bar ba zhes bya dang // rnga rtse nag pa ma gtogs pa //
analyzed: rnga ma 'bar ba zhes bya dang // rnga rtse nag pa ma gtogs pa //
translated: The one called Jvalanaka, and the one called Kṛṣṇamūrdhnā,

original: rta ni kha dog nag pa la //
analyzed: rta ni kha dog nag pa la //
translated: the horse is black in color,

original: dkar po cung zad yod pa shis //
analyzed: dkar po cung zad yod pa shis //
translated: but a little white is auspicious.

original: lham bu chu shel mdog 'dra zhing //
analyzed: lham bu chu shel mdog 'dra zhing //
translated: The one whose color is like that of a crystal,

original: gang gi mgo ni dkar gyur pa //
analyzed: gang gi mgo ni dkar gyur pa //
translated: the one whose head is white,

original: rta de dpal yon can zhes bya //
analyzed: rta de dpal yon can zhes bya //
translated: that horse is called Śrīvatsa,

original: rgyal po rnam rgyal skyed byed yin //
analyzed: rgyal po rnam rgyal skyed byed yin //
translated: the one who produces the king Vijaya.

original: sha li ho tra'i mdo'i gnas las 'dres pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o /
analyzed: sha li ho tra'i mdo'i gnas las 'dres pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o /
translated: This concludes the chapter on the mixed, the twenty-second chapter in the section on the sūtra of Śālihotrī.

original: // / kha ba can gyis ri bo'i mchog /'byung khungs sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa //
analyzed: // / kha ba can gyis ri bo'i mchog /'byung khungs sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa //
translated: The supreme mountain of the snowy land, adorned with various sources,

original: shin tu mtho zhing rtse mo che //
analyzed: shin tu mtho zhing rtse mo che //
translated: very high, with great peaks,

original: kun nas rlung ni mi ldang zhing //
analyzed: kun nas rlung ni mi ldang zhing //
translated: completely unmoved by the wind,

original: rtse mo kha bas rnam par g-yogs //
analyzed: rtse mo kha bas rnam par g-yogs //
translated: its peaks covered with snow,

original: mi 'am ci yi glu @197b sgras khyab //
analyzed: mi 'am ci yi glu @197b sgras khyab //
translated: pervading with the songs of kinnaras,

original: bya rnams sna tshogs sgra 'byin cing //
analyzed: bya rnams sna tshogs sgra 'byin cing //
translated: various birds singing,

original: ri dags sna tshogs rnams kyis mdzes //
analyzed: ri dags sna tshogs rnams kyis mdzes //
translated: beautified by various deer,

original: sna tshogs shing gis kun du khyab //
analyzed: sna tshogs shing gis kun du khyab //
translated: pervading with various trees,

original: mkha' la rgyu ba rtag tu dga' //
analyzed: mkha' la rgyu ba rtag tu dga' //
translated: always delightful to those who move in the sky.

original: rig 'dzin tshogs ni legs gnas shing //
analyzed: rig 'dzin tshogs ni legs gnas shing //
translated: The assembly of Vidyādharas is well-established,

original: dri za'i chogs kyis bsten par ni //
analyzed: dri za'i chogs kyis bsten par ni //
translated: And is attended by the assembly of Gandharvas.

original: sha li ho tra legs gnas la //
analyzed: sha li ho tra legs gnas la //
translated: Śālihotra is well-established.

original: legs thos kyis ni yang dris pas //
analyzed: legs thos kyis ni yang dris pas //
translated: Subhadra asked again:

original: rgyal po'i bzhon par 'os pa'i rta //
analyzed: rgyal po'i bzhon par 'os pa'i rta //
translated: “The horse suitable for the king’s mount,

original: drang srong chen pos bdag la gsungs //
analyzed: drang srong chen pos bdag la gsungs //
translated: The great sage, please tell me.

original: rgyal po'i rta ni ci lta bu //
analyzed: rgyal po'i rta ni ci lta bu //
translated: What is the king’s horse like?

original: de yi nges pa bdag la gsungs //
analyzed: de yi nges pa bdag la gsungs //
translated: Please tell me its definition.”

original: bu yis de skad dris pa dang // sha li ho tras slar smras pa //
analyzed: bu yis de skad dris pa dang // sha li ho tras slar smras pa //
translated: When the son asked this, Śālihotra replied:

original: yon tan skyon dag rgyal po la //
analyzed: yon tan skyon dag rgyal po la //
translated: “The king’s horse has good qualities and faults.

original: 'jig rten 'byung ba ci 'dra bar //🔽de ltar tha ma mi rnams la //
analyzed: 'jig rten 'byung ba ci 'dra bar // de ltar tha ma mi rnams la //
translated: How does it arise in the world?🔽Thus, it is said in the scriptures

original: 'byung mi 'byung bar gzhung las bshad //
analyzed: 'byung mi 'byung bar gzhung las bshad //
translated: That it will or will not arise in the end for humans.

original: de bas rgyal po'i bzhon pa yin //
analyzed: de bas rgyal po'i bzhon pa yin //
translated: Therefore, it is the king’s mount.

original: mtshan nyid 'bad pas brtag par bya //🔽ci nas nyes pa mi 'byung ba //
analyzed: mtshan nyid 'bad pas brtag par bya // ci nas nyes pa mi 'byung ba //
translated: Its characteristics should be examined with effort.🔽In every way, one should act

original: rnam pa kun du bya ba yin //🔽tshad dang stobs dang snying stobs gzi //
analyzed: rnam pa kun du bya ba yin // tshad dang stobs dang snying stobs gzi //
translated: So that faults do not arise.🔽It has measure, strength, courage,

original: stobs dang lus kyi me drod ldan //
analyzed: stobs dang lus kyi me drod ldan //
translated: Strength, and bodily heat.

original: gtsug 'khyil bzang zhing mdangs rab snang //
analyzed: gtsug 'khyil bzang zhing mdangs rab snang //
translated: His head is well-shaped and his luster is bright.🔽He has an excellent gait, a good voice, a sweet smell,🔽and likewise, a good birth,

original: 'gros ni phun sum tshogs pa dang // skad bzang dri ni zhim pa dang // de bzhin skye gnas bzang ba dang // rig ldan ngang tshul phun sum tshogs //
analyzed: 'gros ni phun sum tshogs pa dang // skad bzang dri ni zhim pa dang // de bzhin skye gnas bzang ba dang // rig ldan ngang tshul phun sum tshogs //
translated: knowledge, and perfect morality.🔽He is disciplined and delightful to behold,🔽and has the best phlegm constitution,🔽and likewise, a good birth,

original: dul zhing mthong na dga' ba dang // bad kan rang bzhin can mchog dang // de bzhin bzang po'i skye gnas dang // smad pa'i mtshan nyid med gyur cing //
analyzed: dul zhing mthong na dga' ba dang // bad kan rang bzhin can mchog dang // de bzhin bzang po'i skye gnas dang // smad pa'i mtshan nyid med gyur cing //
translated: free from contemptible characteristics.

original: kun nas rnam pa thams cad du //
analyzed: kun nas rnam pa thams cad du //
translated: In every way,

original: mtshan nyid bzang po phun tshogs pa //
analyzed: mtshan nyid bzang po phun tshogs pa //
translated: he is endowed with excellent characteristics.

original: rab tu 'bad de brtag par bya //
analyzed: rab tu 'bad de brtag par bya //
translated: One should examine him with great effort.

original: rgyal po'i bzhon par 'os pa'i rta //
analyzed: rgyal po'i bzhon par 'os pa'i rta //
translated: A horse suitable for a king's mount

original: rgyal po'i rta zhes bya bar bshad //
analyzed: rgyal po'i rta zhes bya bar bshad //
translated: is explained as a king's horse.

original: gang zhig gzhan kun med pa yi //
analyzed: gang zhig gzhan kun med pa yi //
translated: One who lacks all other [qualities],

original: brtan pa'i gtsug ni bcu dang ldan //
analyzed: brtan pa'i gtsug ni bcu dang ldan //
translated: but has the ten virtues of a steadfast one,

original: rgyal po'i bzhon par 'os pa'i rta //
analyzed: rgyal po'i bzhon par 'os pa'i rta //
translated: is a horse suitable for a king's mount.🔽One with eyes like a jasmine flower,

original: ma li ka dang 'dra ba'i mig / mdog snum rab tu dkar ba'i rta //
analyzed: ma li ka dang 'dra ba'i mig / mdog snum rab tu dkar ba'i rta //
translated: an oily coat, and a very white horse,

original: zla ba'i lha dang ldan pa yin //
analyzed: zla ba'i lha dang ldan pa yin //
translated: And is endowed with the lunar deity.

original: rgyal po de la zhon na ni //
analyzed: rgyal po de la zhon na ni //
translated: If the king mounts him,

original: sa steng dbang du byad par 'gyur //
analyzed: sa steng dbang du byad par 'gyur //
translated: He will bring the earth under his control.

original: ne tsho mdog can nyi ma'i rta //
analyzed: ne tsho mdog can nyi ma'i rta //
translated: The sun's horse, which is the color of a parrot,

original: rgyal po'i g-yul ngor zhon na ni //
analyzed: rgyal po'i g-yul ngor zhon na ni //
translated: If the king mounts him in battle,

original: de yi don rnams 'grub 'gyur zhing //
analyzed: de yi don rnams 'grub 'gyur zhing //
translated: His aims will be accomplished,

original: sa yang dbang du byed par 'gyur //
analyzed: sa yang dbang du byed par 'gyur //
translated: And he will bring the earth under his control.

original: de bzhin rgyal po'i mdog dmar rta //
analyzed: de bzhin rgyal po'i mdog dmar rta //
translated: Similarly, the king's horse, which is red,

original: rnam thos sras kyi lha can te //
analyzed: rnam thos sras kyi lha can te //
translated: Is endowed with the deity of Vaiśravaṇa.

original: de la bzhon na sa rnams ni //🔽ma @198a * //
analyzed: de la bzhon na sa rnams ni // ma @198a * //
translated: If he mounts him,🔽Without doubt he will control

original: lus dbang byed the tshom med //
analyzed: lus dbang byed the tshom med //
translated: The entire earth.

original: sngo bsangs lha dbang rta yin te //🔽mdangs snum ldan la rgyal po ni //
analyzed: sngo bsangs lha dbang rta yin te // mdangs snum ldan la rgyal po ni //
translated: The horse of the lord of the gods is bluish-green,

original: zhon na sa ni ma lus las //
analyzed: zhon na sa ni ma lus las //
translated: And the king, if he mounts the one with a glossy luster,

original: rtag tu rgyal bar nges pa yin //🔽gnag cing 'tsher ba'i mdangs dang ldan //
analyzed: rtag tu rgyal bar nges pa yin // gnag cing 'tsher ba'i mdangs dang ldan //
translated: Will certainly always be victorious🔽Over the entire earth.🔽The supreme horse, which is black and has a shiny luster,

original: rta mchog de ni chu lha'i yin //
analyzed: rta mchog de ni chu lha'i yin //
translated: Is that of Varuṇa.

original: de la zhon na rgyal po ni //
analyzed: de la zhon na rgyal po ni //
translated: If the king mounts him,

original: myur du nor dang 'bru 'phel 'gyur //
analyzed: myur du nor dang 'bru 'phel 'gyur //
translated: He will quickly increase his wealth and grain.

original: mdog dkar rna ba sngo ba dang // rngog ma dang ni rnga ma gnag / chu lha'i rta ni gnyis pa ste //
analyzed: mdog dkar rna ba sngo ba dang // rngog ma dang ni rnga ma gnag / chu lha'i rta ni gnyis pa ste //
translated: is the second horse of the water god.

original: de rnyed pa ni ma lus 'thob //
analyzed: de rnyed pa ni ma lus 'thob //
translated: If one obtains it, one will obtain everything.

original: lham bu chu shes ltar snang ba //
analyzed: lham bu chu shes ltar snang ba //
translated: It appears like a water-born jewel.

original: rta ni nor lha'i yin par bshad //
analyzed: rta ni nor lha'i yin par bshad //
translated: The horse is said to belong to the god of wealth.

original: rgyal po de la zhon na ni //
analyzed: rgyal po de la zhon na ni //
translated: If a king rides it,

original: myur du nor mang bdag por 'gyur //
analyzed: myur du nor mang bdag por 'gyur //
translated: he will quickly become the lord of much wealth.🔽White in color like a conch, with a black mane and tail,

original: ba so'i mdog 'dra rnga ma gnag / kun nas mdangs ni snum dang ldan //

original: gtsug rnams kyi ni mtshan nyid ni //
analyzed: gtsug rnams kyi ni mtshan nyid ni //
translated: the characteristics of the crowns,

original: gang du ji ltar gnas pa yin //
analyzed: gang du ji ltar gnas pa yin //
translated: where and how they are located,

original: gtsug rnams kyi ni dbyibs gyur pa //
analyzed: gtsug rnams kyi ni dbyibs gyur pa //
translated: The shape of the crown of the head

original: rnam pa dur ni 'gyur pa gsungs //
analyzed: rnam pa dur ni 'gyur pa gsungs //
translated: is said to be of three types.🔽How much is the measure of the crown of the head?

original: gtsug gi tshad ni ji tsam zhig / shes dang smad pa'i grangs ni du //
analyzed: gtsug gi tshad ni ji tsam zhig / shes dang smad pa'i grangs ni du //
translated: How many are the numbers of the upper and lower [teeth]?🔽All [teeth] are produced from the same place,

original: thams cad gnas las 'phro ba dang // g-yas pa dang ni g-yon pa dang // stabs ba dang ni sman pa yi //
analyzed: thams cad gnas las 'phro ba dang // g-yas pa dang ni g-yon pa dang // stabs ba dang ni sman pa yi //
translated: the right and left [teeth] are equal,🔽and the upper and lower [teeth] are even.

original: 'bras bu 'od zer ci ltar 'gyur ;
analyzed: 'bras bu 'od zer ci ltar 'gyur ;
translated: How do the results of the light rays come about?

original: / gzhan yang lus kyi mtshan nyid ni //
analyzed: / gzhan yang lus kyi mtshan nyid ni //
translated: Moreover, the characteristics of the body

original: brtan dang mi brtan ji lta bu //
analyzed: brtan dang mi brtan ji lta bu //
translated: are of what kind, stable or unstable?

original: lus las skyes pa'i gnas rnams ni //
analyzed: lus las skyes pa'i gnas rnams ni //
translated: The places produced from the body🔽are the places of the four elements.🔽The temporary results of the distinctions of the color of the palate

original: gnas kyi gang zhig gnas skabs dang // rkan gyi kha dog bye brag gi / glo bur byung ba'i 'bras bu dang // srab dang mthug pa'i spu rnams ni //
analyzed: gnas kyi gang zhig gnas skabs dang // rkan gyi kha dog bye brag gi / glo bur byung ba'i 'bras bu dang // srab dang mthug pa'i spu rnams ni //
translated: and the thin and thick hairs

original: gtsug pa ji ltar 'byung ba lags //
analyzed: gtsug pa ji ltar 'byung ba lags //
translated: how do the crowns of the head come about?

original: de skad thub mchog la dris tshe //
analyzed: de skad thub mchog la dris tshe //
translated: When this was asked of the supreme sage,

original: sha li ho tra sa bu la smas //
analyzed: sha li ho tra sa bu la smas //
translated: Śālihotra spoke to his son:🔽Here, the stable and unstable

original: 'di na brtan dang mi brtan dang // yan lag rnam pa brgyad yin la //
analyzed: 'di na brtan dang mi brtan dang // yan lag rnam pa brgyad yin la //
translated: are the eight types of limbs.

original: 'bras bu 'byung ba'i tshul gyis ni //
analyzed: 'bras bu 'byung ba'i tshul gyis ni //
translated: The nature of the signs is to be known

original: tshan nyid rab tu shes par bya //
analyzed: tshan nyid rab tu shes par bya //
translated: by the way in which the results occur.

original: shis dang rma bya'i mtshan @200a * //
analyzed: shis dang rma bya'i mtshan @200a * //
translated: The signs of good and bad fortune

original: nyid ni // thams cad lus la brten pa yin //
analyzed: nyid ni // thams cad lus la brten pa yin //
translated: are all based on the body.

original: lus las 'byung bar gyur pa ni //
analyzed: lus las 'byung bar gyur pa ni //
translated: That which occurs from the body

original: lus dang yan lag rnam pa gnyis //
analyzed: lus dang yan lag rnam pa gnyis //
translated: is the body and its limbs, which are of two kinds.🔽The crest jewel, which is known as the abode of virtue,

original: dge ba'i gnas su shas pa'i gtsug / rgya che ba yi 'bras bu ster //
analyzed: dge ba'i gnas su shas pa'i gtsug / rgya che ba yi 'bras bu ster //
translated: gives a vast result.

original: mi shis gnas ni ngan pa 'byung //
analyzed: mi shis gnas ni ngan pa 'byung //
translated: The abode of bad fortune gives a bad result.

original: shin tu mi shis skal chen 'gyur //
analyzed: shin tu mi shis skal chen 'gyur //
translated: Very bad fortune gives a great share.

original: tshad dang ldan zhing gsal bar byung //
analyzed: tshad dang ldan zhing gsal bar byung //
translated: Having the right size and being clear,

original: mtshan nyid ldan pa'i 'bras bu che //
analyzed: mtshan nyid ldan pa'i 'bras bu che //
translated: it has the characteristics of a great result.

original: tshad mi ldan zhing mi gsal ba //
analyzed: tshad mi ldan zhing mi gsal ba //
translated: Not having the right size and being unclear,

original: de'i 'bras bu chung bar 'dod //
analyzed: de'i 'bras bu chung bar 'dod //
translated: its result is held to be small.

original: gnas dang dbyibs kyi bye brag las //
analyzed: gnas dang dbyibs kyi bye brag las //
translated: From the particular location and shape,

original: mtshan nyid 'bras bu chen por 'gyur //
analyzed: mtshan nyid 'bras bu chen por 'gyur //
translated: the characteristics give a great result.

original: sor gnyis las lhag nya phyis te ;
analyzed: sor gnyis las lhag nya phyis te ;
translated: More than two finger-widths is a shell,

original: / sor gnyis pa ni lhag ces bya //
analyzed: / sor gnyis pa ni lhag ces bya //
translated: two finger-widths is called an excess.

original: shing lham 'dra dang rkang brgya ba //
analyzed: shing lham 'dra dang rkang brgya ba //
translated: Like a wooden shoe and a hundred feet,

original: sor ni phyed dang gnyis pa yin //
analyzed: sor ni phyed dang gnyis pa yin //
translated: it is one and a half finger-widths.

original: shing lham phyed ni nas drug zheng //
analyzed: shing lham phyed ni nas drug zheng //
translated: The shoe is six barley grains in length and🔽three and a half in width.

original: 'dres pa sor ni brgyad pa yin //
analyzed: 'dres pa sor ni brgyad pa yin //
translated: The mixed one is eight barley grains in length.

original: de yi cha gsum phri ba ni //
analyzed: de yi cha gsum phri ba ni //
translated: Subtracting three parts of that,

original: 'khyil ba zhes ni bya bar bshad //
analyzed: 'khyil ba zhes ni bya bar bshad //
translated: it is explained as the so-called curl.

original: bzhi cha phri bar gyur pa ni //
analyzed: bzhi cha phri bar gyur pa ni //
translated: Subtracting a quarter,

original: kha 'bus pa zhes bya ba yin //
analyzed: kha 'bus pa zhes bya ba yin //
translated: it is called the sprout.

original: de las lhag pa'am ma tshang pa'i //
analyzed: de las lhag pa'am ma tshang pa'i //
translated: More than that or less than that,

original: gtsug ni 'bras bu med pa yin //
analyzed: gtsug ni 'bras bu med pa yin //
translated: the topknot is fruitless.🔽Soft skin, fine hair,

original: pags srab spu ni phra ba dang // lus kyi gsang ba'i gnas su byung //
analyzed: pags srab spu ni phra ba dang // lus kyi gsang ba'i gnas su byung //
translated: and the secret places of the body

original: de ni ngo bo nyid kyis phra //
analyzed: de ni ngo bo nyid kyis phra //
translated: are naturally fine.

original: tshad dang ldan rung mi ldan rung //
analyzed: tshad dang ldan rung mi ldan rung //
translated: Whether it has the right size or not,

original: 'bras bu bcas par shes par bya //
analyzed: 'bras bu bcas par shes par bya //
translated: it should be known as having results.

original: phra ba de dag gnod byed yin //
analyzed: phra ba de dag gnod byed yin //
translated: Those fine ones are harmful.🔽The auspicious and inauspicious will be explained below

original: yan lag brgyad pa'i mtshan nyid kyis //🔽shis dang mi shis 'og nas bshad //🔽rta yi gnas bcu'i spu tshogs la //
analyzed: yan lag brgyad pa'i mtshan nyid kyis // shis dang mi shis 'og nas bshad // rta yi gnas bcu'i spu tshogs la //
translated: by the characteristics of the eight limbs.

original: bstan pa gang yin der shes bya //
analyzed: bstan pa gang yin der shes bya //
translated: One should know that which is taught🔽in the ten horse places of hair.🔽One each on the lips and beak,

original: mchu sgros rngog mar re re dang // gtsug dang brad la gnyis gnyis te //
analyzed: mchu sgros rngog mar re re dang // gtsug dang brad la gnyis gnyis te //
translated: two each on the crest and comb,

original: rgyu zhabs rkub lhag gnyis gnyis te //
analyzed: rgyu zhabs rkub lhag gnyis gnyis te //
translated: The two heels and the two calves,

original: bcu po de dag ldan par bshad //
analyzed: bcu po de dag ldan par bshad //
translated: These ten are said to be complete.

original: kun nas rdzogs shing shin du gsal //
analyzed: kun nas rdzogs shing shin du gsal //
translated: They are completely perfect and very clear.🔽The crown is coiled to the right,

original: gtsug ni g-yas su 'khyil ba dang // chung ba ma yin che ba min //
analyzed: gtsug ni g-yas su 'khyil ba dang // chung ba ma yin che ba min //
translated: not small, not large,

original: gser ltar mdangs snum 'od dang bcas //
analyzed: gser ltar mdangs snum 'od dang bcas //
translated: like gold, with luster and shine.🔽The shape is well-formed,

original: dbyibs ni legs par skyes pa dag / las rnams thams cad sgrub byed yin //
analyzed: dbyibs ni legs par skyes pa dag / las rnams thams cad sgrub byed yin //
translated: accomplishing all actions.

original: legs thos the tshom skyes gyur nas //
analyzed: legs thos the tshom skyes gyur nas //
translated: Having heard this well, doubt arose,

original: drang srong de la slar smras pa //
analyzed: drang srong de la slar smras pa //
translated: and he again spoke to the sage:

original: ji ltar bcu po nyid ldan gyi //
analyzed: ji ltar bcu po nyid ldan gyi //
translated: How is it that only the ten

original: gzhan dag de ltar ma yin bshad //
analyzed: gzhan dag de ltar ma yin bshad //
translated: are explained, not the others?

original: rta rnams skyes zin gyur nas ni //
analyzed: rta rnams skyes zin gyur nas ni //
translated: Once horses are born,

original: gtsug de nam yang mi skye la //
analyzed: gtsug de nam yang mi skye la //
translated: that crown is never born again.

original: skyes pa 'jig par mi 'gyur zhing //
analyzed: skyes pa 'jig par mi 'gyur zhing //
translated: What is born does not perish,

original: @200b gnas las 'pho bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: @200b gnas las 'pho bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: and it does not move from its place.

original: skyes tshe lhan cig skye bar 'gyur //
analyzed: skyes tshe lhan cig skye bar 'gyur //
translated: When born, it is born together,

original: de bas thams cad bstan pa yin //
analyzed: de bas thams cad bstan pa yin //
translated: therefore, all are taught.

original: legs thos tshig ni thos pa dang // de rjes drang srong gis smras pa //
analyzed: legs thos tshig ni thos pa dang // de rjes drang srong gis smras pa //
translated: Having heard this well, the sage spoke these words:

original: ji ltar phyogs der skyes gyur pa //
analyzed: ji ltar phyogs der skyes gyur pa //
translated: Just as it is for those born in that direction,

original: de ltar gzhan du ma yin pa //
analyzed: de ltar gzhan du ma yin pa //
translated: it is not so for others.

original: pha mar yod dang med gyur kyang //
analyzed: pha mar yod dang med gyur kyang //
translated: Even if there is no mother or father,

original: cig shos la ni dbang ba yin //
analyzed: cig shos la ni dbang ba yin //
translated: it is under the control of the other.

original: phal tsher gnas bcur dbang gyur gyi //
analyzed: phal tsher gnas bcur dbang gyur gyi //
translated: For the most part, it is under the control of the ten abodes,

original: de ltar gzhan du mi snang ngo //
analyzed: de ltar gzhan du mi snang ngo //
translated: but it does not appear in that way.

original: de bas bcu po bstan par bya //
analyzed: de bas bcu po bstan par bya //
translated: Therefore, the ten will be taught,

original: nges pa nyid du zung bar gyis //🔽'di dag la med nges 'byung ba //
analyzed: nges pa nyid du zung bar gyis // 'di dag la med nges 'byung ba //
translated: so grasp them with certainty.🔽It is explained that these definitely arise,

original: gzhan dag de ltar min par bshad //
analyzed: gzhan dag de ltar min par bshad //
translated: but others do not.

original: brtan dang mi brtan gang yin kyang //
analyzed: brtan dang mi brtan gang yin kyang //
translated: Whether stable or unstable,

original: 'bras bu rnam pa gnyis su bshad //
analyzed: 'bras bu rnam pa gnyis su bshad //
translated: the result is explained as twofold.

original: gnas ni dgu bcu rtsa drug yin //
analyzed: gnas ni dgu bcu rtsa drug yin //
translated: The abode is ninety-six,

original: dbyibs ni rgyal po nyid yin no //
analyzed: dbyibs ni rgyal po nyid yin no //
translated: and the shape is the king.🔽Mixed, sprouting, coiled, with a hundred feet, and more,

original: 'dres dang kha 'bus 'khyil ba dang / rkang ba brgya dang lhag pa dang // shing lham dang 'dra shin lham phyed / nya phyis 'dra ste rnam par brgyad //🔽smad pa'am bsngags pa'i gnas dag gam //
analyzed: 'dres dang kha 'bus 'khyil ba dang / rkang ba brgya dang lhag pa dang // shing lham dang 'dra shin lham phyed / nya phyis 'dra ste rnam par brgyad // smad pa'am bsngags pa'i gnas dag gam //
translated: like wooden shoes, half shoes, and oyster shells—eight.🔽The abode of praise or blame,

original: gnas su bstan dang ma bstan gang //
analyzed: gnas su bstan dang ma bstan gang //
translated: whether taught as an abode or not taught as an abode,

original: gtsug 'khyil pa yi dbyibs byung na //
analyzed: gtsug 'khyil pa yi dbyibs byung na //
translated: If a curl of hair occurs in the shape of a coil,

original: de ni rjes mthun 'bras bu skyes //
analyzed: de ni rjes mthun 'bras bu skyes //
translated: that is a sign of a corresponding result.

original: 'khyil ba chu skor lta bu yin //
analyzed: 'khyil ba chu skor lta bu yin //
translated: A curl of hair like a water wheel

original: nya phyis nya phyis dbyibs ltar 'ong //🔽dbyibs gcig gnyis sam mang por ni //
analyzed: nya phyis nya phyis dbyibs ltar 'ong // dbyibs gcig gnyis sam mang por ni //
translated: will come in the shape of a shell.🔽When one, two, or many shapes

original: du ma gang tshe 'dus gyur pa'i //🔽gtsug 'khyil de ni dres pa 'am //
analyzed: du ma gang tshe 'dus gyur pa'i // gtsug 'khyil de ni dres pa 'am //
translated: are gathered together in many ways,🔽that curl of hair is said to be a knot

original: 'dus pa zhes ni bya bar bshad //
analyzed: 'dus pa zhes ni bya bar bshad //
translated: or a gathering.🔽When the hair is like a flower

original: spu ni 'gro tshe me tog dag / kha 'bus ltar sang kha 'bus yin //
analyzed: spu ni 'gro tshe me tog dag / kha 'bus ltar sang kha 'bus yin //
translated: budding at the time of going, it is a bud.

original: bzlog pa ltar snang lhag pa yin //
analyzed: bzlog pa ltar snang lhag pa yin //
translated: The opposite appearance is an excess.

original: zlum po'am yang na zur bzhi ni //
analyzed: zlum po'am yang na zur bzhi ni //
translated: Round or with four corners,

original: shing lham dbyibs 'dra shing lham can //
analyzed: shing lham dbyibs 'dra shing lham can //
translated: like the shape of a wooden shoe, it is a wooden shoe.

original: brang ba'am yang na rting pa'i gnas //
analyzed: brang ba'am yang na rting pa'i gnas //
translated: At the place of the instep or heel,

original: byed 'dra shing lham phyed pa yin //
analyzed: byed 'dra shing lham phyed pa yin //
translated: like a bird, it is a half-wooden shoe.

original: me tog mgo lcogs dbyibs 'dra ba //
analyzed: me tog mgo lcogs dbyibs 'dra ba //
translated: Like the shape of a flower bud,

original: de ni rkang brgyad par shes bya //
analyzed: de ni rkang brgyad par shes bya //
translated: it is known as an eight-petaled one.

original: dbyibs las mi mthun gyur pa ni //
analyzed: dbyibs las mi mthun gyur pa ni //
translated: The opposite of the shapes

original: gzhan dag kyang ni snad mod kyi //
analyzed: gzhan dag kyang ni snad mod kyi //
translated: may be damaged by others,

original: de ni spu yi 'gyur ba yin //
analyzed: de ni spu yi 'gyur ba yin //
translated: but that is a change in the hair.

original: gnas las shis dang mi shis 'gyur //
analyzed: gnas las shis dang mi shis 'gyur //
translated: The auspicious and inauspicious are determined by the location.

original: gtsug kyang gnas dang dbyibs dang ni //
analyzed: gtsug kyang gnas dang dbyibs dang ni //
translated: The crown of the head should be known by its location, shape,

original: mi shis mtshan nyid shes par bya //
analyzed: mi shis mtshan nyid shes par bya //
translated: and inauspicious characteristics.🔽If the crown of the head is uneven, displaced,

original: cha dang 'phos dang 'thor ba dang // gtsug ni 'phred du 'byung ba dang // lhag pa 'am chad par gyur pa'am //🔽gang yang gnas las 'pho 'gyur pa'am //
analyzed: cha dang 'phos dang 'thor ba dang // gtsug ni 'phred du 'byung ba dang // lhag pa 'am chad par gyur pa'am // gang yang gnas las 'pho 'gyur pa'am //
translated: or missing, or if it is in an abnormal location,🔽or if it has an ugly shape or color,

original: dbyibs ngan mdog ni mi sdug pa / brtan po rnams ni mi snang @201a * //
analyzed: dbyibs ngan mdog ni mi sdug pa / brtan po rnams ni mi snang @201a * //
translated: or if it is not visible,🔽or if it is curled to the right in an inauspicious place,

original: ba'am ; / smad pa'i gnas su g-yas 'khyil dang // bsngags pa'i gnas su g-yon 'khyil ba //
analyzed: ba'am ; / smad pa'i gnas su g-yas 'khyil dang // bsngags pa'i gnas su g-yon 'khyil ba //
translated: or if it is curled to the left in an auspicious place,

original: mtshan nyid ngan pa yin zhes bya //
analyzed: mtshan nyid ngan pa yin zhes bya //
translated: it is said to be an inauspicious characteristic.

original: des ni tshe thung skyed par byed //🔽gtsug gi gnas ni dgu bcu drug / yod pa bshad pa de rnams ni //
analyzed: des ni tshe thung skyed par byed // gtsug gi gnas ni dgu bcu drug / yod pa bshad pa de rnams ni //
translated: It causes a short life.🔽The sixty-nine locations of the crown

original: shis dang smad par bya ba ste //
analyzed: shis dang smad par bya ba ste //
translated: are explained to be auspicious and inauspicious.

original: rnam pa gnyis su bsdu bar bya //
analyzed: rnam pa gnyis su bsdu bar bya //
translated: They are summarized into two types.

original: de las gzhan ni nyi shu zhig / shis pa yin par shes par bya //
analyzed: de las gzhan ni nyi shu zhig / shis pa yin par shes par bya //
translated: Twenty of them are to be known as auspicious.

original: bdun cu rtsa drug smad bya ste //
analyzed: bdun cu rtsa drug smad bya ste //
translated: Seventy-six are to be deprecated.

original: de ltar dgu bcu rtsa drug yin //
analyzed: de ltar dgu bcu rtsa drug yin //
translated: Thus, there are ninety-six.

original: kha 'gram la gnyis dbral bar bzhi //
analyzed: kha 'gram la gnyis dbral bar bzhi //
translated: There are two on the sides of the mouth, and four on the jaw.

original: dpal mtshams la gcig kho na yin //
analyzed: dpal mtshams la gcig kho na yin //
translated: There is only one on the glorious joint.

original: rna rtsar gnyis te lkog mar gcig //
analyzed: rna rtsar gnyis te lkog mar gcig //
translated: There are two on the ear-lobes, and one on the throat.

original: mgo bo'i mthar ni gnyis yin la //
analyzed: mgo bo'i mthar ni gnyis yin la //
translated: There are two on the end of the head,

original: brang du gsum ste dpung par gnyis //
analyzed: brang du gsum ste dpung par gnyis //
translated: three on the chest, and two on the shoulders.

original: mid ba gcig ste de bzhin du //
analyzed: mid ba gcig ste de bzhin du //
translated: There is one on the neck, and likewise

original: rgyu dang long gu gnyis gnyis su //
analyzed: rgyu dang long gu gnyis gnyis su //
translated: two on the intestines and the rectum.

original: gtsug ni 'byung bar shes par bya //
analyzed: gtsug ni 'byung bar shes par bya //
translated: The crown is known as the navel.🔽Thus, these twenty

original: de ltar shis par gyur pa'i gnas //
analyzed: de ltar shis par gyur pa'i gnas //
translated: auspicious places

original: nyi shu yin par rnam par bshad //
analyzed: nyi shu yin par rnam par bshad //
translated: are explained.

original: gtsug ni 'di rnams gnyis la ni //
analyzed: gtsug ni 'di rnams gnyis la ni //
translated: On the two crowns,

original: sum cu rtsa bdun grangs su 'gyur //
analyzed: sum cu rtsa bdun grangs su 'gyur //
translated: there are thirty-seven.🔽The cheeks, the upper cheeks, the chin,🔽the temples, the nostrils, the eyebrows,

original: mur 'gram mur gong mchi stan dang // mkhur tshos sna phor smin ma dang // rna rtsa lce'u ldang rtsi'u chung dang // mchan khung dgu dang 'gram sre long //
analyzed: mur 'gram mur gong mchi stan dang // mkhur tshos sna phor smin ma dang // rna rtsa lce'u ldang rtsi'u chung dang // mchan khung dgu dang 'gram sre long //
translated: the ear-lobes, the Adam's apple, the collar bones,🔽the armpits, the shoulders,

original: sna rtse bus mo mig 'bras gnyis //
analyzed: sna rtse bus mo mig 'bras gnyis //
translated: the tip of the nose, the knees, the eyes,

original: rtsi ba logs rkub tshos dag tu ni //
analyzed: rtsi ba logs rkub tshos dag tu ni //
translated: the ribs, and the buttocks,

original: gnas ni gnyis gnyis dag tu gtsug / gnyis gnyis 'byung ba sum cu drug / sna gdong mchu ltag srol mdud dang // dpung sna snying ga ze'u drug mdo //
analyzed: gnas ni gnyis gnyis dag tu gtsug / gnyis gnyis 'byung ba sum cu drug / sna gdong mchu ltag srol mdud dang // dpung sna snying ga ze'u drug mdo //
translated: The nose, the face, the lips, the back, the joints, the shoulders, the heart, the throat, the navel, the buttocks, the anus,

original: lte ba rkub dang mjug srub dang // ya mchu ze'u ltag sga 'og ste //
analyzed: lte ba rkub dang mjug srub dang // ya mchu ze'u ltag sga 'og ste //
translated: the upper lip, the throat, the back of the neck, the lower lip, the back of the neck, the hump, and the tail.

original: de ltar gnas ni de dag tu //
analyzed: de ltar gnas ni de dag tu //
translated: Thus, in those places,

original: gtsug ni bcu gsum 'byung ba yin //
analyzed: gtsug ni bcu gsum 'byung ba yin //
translated: the crown is the thirteen.

original: tshe'u spu de bzhin tshigs grangs dang // tshe'u tshe gcig phra mo yi //
analyzed: tshe'u spu de bzhin tshigs grangs dang // tshe'u tshe gcig phra mo yi //
translated: The teeth, the hair, the joints, and the teeth, the one, the small.

original: gnas ni bcu drug 'di dag tu //
analyzed: gnas ni bcu drug 'di dag tu //
translated: In these sixteen places,
